original_text: The pots, the shovels, the forks, and all the equipment for these Huram-abi made of burnished bronze for King Solomon for the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 솥과 부삽과 고기 갈고리와 여호와의 전의 모든 그릇들이라 후람의 아버지가 솔로몬 왕을 위하여 빛나는 놋으로 만들 때에

sentences.original_text: The pots, the shovels, and the forks
and all the equipment for these
Huram-abi made them of burnished bronze
for the house of the Lord.
